HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Balíkovna na adresu: 79 Kč, DPD: 79 Kč, PPL: 79 Kč. A 49 Kč packing fee applies to all orders.

providers: Unnamed provider for items over 30 kg
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 539 Kč for orders over 30 kg. A 49 Kč packing fee applies.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna: 55 Kč, Zásilkovna: 59 Kč, DPD Pickup Points: 59 Kč, PPL Pickup Points: 59 Kč, Supervýdejny: 30 Kč. A 49 Kč packing fee applies to all orders.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 29 Kč. A 49 Kč packing fee applies.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Megaknihy.cz offers home delivery, bulky item delivery, an extensive network of parcel shops, and in-store pickup at their own bookstores.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Balíkovna, Zásilkovna, DPD, PPL, and Supervýdejny.
PRICING: Home delivery costs 79 Kč. Parcel shop delivery ranges from 30 Kč (Supervýdejny) to 59 Kč. In-store pickup is 29 Kč. Delivery for items over 30 kg is 539 Kč. A mandatory 49 Kč packing fee is added to all orders. No free shipping threshold is mentioned. COD surcharge is 49 Kč where available.
RESTRICTIONS: Zásilkovna pickup points have a 5 kg weight limit. COD is not available for the 'Supervýdejny' pickup option.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A wide variety of third-party pickup points and a network of their own physical bookstores for personal collection.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly laid out on a dedicated page, with costs and providers well-defined. However, it lacks information on free shipping thresholds, express delivery, and weekend delivery. The distinction between parcel shops and parcel lockers is not made.
